channel.title: Scientists are about 10 years away from creating life
channel.description: Found this while surfing around, I can't believe it. They have already created one artificial cell. http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/20249628/&GT1=10252

item.title: Scientists are about 10 years away from creating life
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I thought cloning was creating life. Perhaps its copying life.

Oh well this would be cool but they always say in 10 years then you never hear about it again.

Read full topic
